content: A propos Salut! Lyonnais, 20 ans, j'étudie et travaille pour EPITA, une école d'ingenieurs en informatique. J'ai découvert la programmation à l'age de 8 ans, et je ne me suis jamais arreter depuis. J'ai pu éssayer beacoup de language, mais j'ai une préférence pour le C, C++ et la programmation de bas niveau. Je m'interesse aussi à l'hardware et au systemes embarqués. I guess it's obvious by now but I'm a tech nerd and play my fair share of video games. I am also a roller coaster enthusiast and used to do parkour, though I'm trying to get back at it. Projets Personnel I am currently on my 3rd year of studies, and working on making a shell and a compiler (in C) for a custom language. I am also working on a few side projects. you can check them out here or directly on my github : Svartorm/Svartorm null 0 0 Me Contacter I am currently looking for an internship from July/September 2023 until January/Fevruary 2024. If you are interested, you can contact me via any social media, by email at svartorm@pm.me or by filling the form here.
title: Acceuil
